frame.name: High-Impact Frame
frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

perks.description: Increases this weapon's ready and stow speed.
perks.name: Swap Mag

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability.
perks.name: Slideshot

perks.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perks.name: Kill Clip
